## SendableLiquity.borrow1USD() method

Adjust existing Trove by borrowing more 1USD.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
borrow1USD(amount: Decimalish, maxBorrowingRate?: Decimalish): Promise<SentLiquityTransaction<S, LiquityReceipt<R, TroveAdjustmentDetails>>>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter        | Type                                   | Description                                                                    |
| ---------------- | -------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| amount           | [Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md) | The amount of 1USD to borrow.                                                  |
| maxBorrowingRate | [Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md) | Maximum acceptable [borrowing rate](./lib-base.fees.borrowingrate.md)<!-- -->. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[SentLiquityTransaction](./lib-base.sentliquitytransaction.md)<!-- -->&lt;S, [LiquityReceipt](./lib-base.liquityreceipt.md)<!-- -->&lt;R, [TroveAdjustmentDetails](./lib-base.troveadjustmentdetails.md)<!-- -->&gt;&gt;&gt;

## Remarks

Equivalent to:

```typescript
adjustTrove({ borrow1USD: amount }, maxBorrowingRate);
```
